name: ánemos
description:
The final project of the semester for my university games course!! We were tasked to design and create an environmental game. This is my first ever playable game !! I hope you enjoy it !!

ánemos...

An abandoned greenhouse, notes scattered everywhere. Tall monsteras and hanging plants surround you. A giant statue of a beautiful woman stands before you, a cold breeze fills the space. What happened here? Who lives here? And what does this statue represent?

GAME CONTROLS:

  • WSAD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left Mouse Button to Pick UP
  • E to Interact
  • F to Exit (Notes)
